H0.text: Sun, Earth, Moon is the correct order needed for a solar eclipse to happen.

H1.text: Sun, Moon, Earth is the correct order needed for a solar eclipse to happen.

H2.text: Moon, Sun, Earth is the correct order needed for a solar eclipse to happen.

H3.text: Moon, Earth, Sun is the correct order needed for a solar eclipse to happen.

A4.text: A solar eclipse occurs when the Moon passes between Earth and the Sun, thereby obscuring the view of the Sun from a small part of Earth.
